review: Very good Doctor with good experience. Very friendly and explains everything. I will recommend him to everyone.
reply_text:
Thanks for the kind words.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went to the doctor for my father's angioplasty. His angiography done at other hospital showed major blockages in heart vessel. He explained us the problem very nicely and also explained us the procedure of angioplasty in a very simple language. This reduced our anxiety about the angioplasty procedure. After the angioplasty my father's chest pain has completely disappeared. The doctor also helped us by reducing the overall cost of the procedure to a large extent (the charges quoted at many of the other hospitals was out of our budget). Thank you so much sir.

I went to the doctor for hypertension treatment and was feeling heaviness on chest. Doctor was very polite and humble while listening to my medical concern. The whole process was very comforting for me. I would recommend the doctor if you want hassle free and comforting treatment.

I showed my uncle to dr Munjewar for chest pain. I was expecting that he will go for an angiography. But the doctor examined my uncle properly and advised just ECG, 2D echo and a stress test. After looking at the results he said that the pain is not due to heart problem and there is no need of angiography. My uncle is doing well now. I am happy that the doctor avoids expensive tests when not needed *** ******* **** *** ********* ******

Showed to the doctor for breathing difficulty. The doctor properly examined and after some investigations including echo test advised some medicines and lifestyle changes. Now the complaints are significantly relieved. Thank you.
I got my father's angiography done elsewhere and went to dr Munjewar for angioplasty. He did a fantastic job and completely opened a **** blocked heart blood vessel. Very happy with his treatment.

My aunt was having chest pain. One of my friends suggested me Dr Munjewar. He listened carefully to our complaints. This was followed by angiography and successful angioplasty. Very satisfied with the treatment.
pleased with the approach and management.In detail discussion regarding the condition was very much appreciated.Thank you doctor for good relief and prompt treatment.

review: Have been visiting doctor since last 2 years for my father. His health has been absolutely good and would highly recommend visiting him for any heart related complications

*Dr Available on Sunday
* Staff provided exact location
* Hygiene was at its best
*Dr diagnosed the issue appropriately
* Dr understood the issue and gave a proper advice and medication.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Really a good, true and cost effective doctor, especially for angiography.

Also give a honest opinion, which is rare these days.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Rcently I went to Dr C B Munjewar at FirstHeart cardiac centre for my father's high blood pressure issue. We had earlier shown to few doctors but BP still remained uncontrolled. With Dr Munjewar's medicines, the BP came under control within one week. Thank you so much doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a good experience with Dr Munjewar. Good analysis of my condition. His atttitude was reassuring and made me feel comfortable. Would recommend.

I went there a few days back for stress test. The reception staff is quite friendly and properly guided me about the in clinic procedure. I was almost immediately called in by the doctor for my stress test. The cardiologist Dr Munjewar explained the procedure for the test in detail including how exactly to walk on the treadmill.  Once the test was done, I got the report within the next 15-20 min. Fast service, friendly doctor, cooperative staff. Overall a great experience

The service is very prompt. The moment I entered the clinic, I was immediately called in for a 2d echo test. And once the test was done, I got the report within the next15min. In half an hour my job was done. As I am quite busy, so such a quick service was an extremely pleasant experience.

I have a pain in my chest so i visit here i find that Dr is very friendly , 
And service is very fast 
My 2D eco TMT all are done with an hour I am literally happy giving best opinion to me which is help full 
Thanks ☺️
